text:
ShareGrid | Full-Stack Rails Developer | Seattle, WA | ONSITE, Full-time, http://sharegrid.com/

We're a 15 person, passionate, fun, fast-growing, VC funded startup dubbed "The AirBnb of Cameras"

We help over 45,000 creatives share $420m of professional camera gear in the largest creative rental marketplace (http://www.sharegrid.com).

Looking for a talented full-stack Rails developer to join our development team here in Seattle.

Our current stack is Rails, React, JS/jQuery, HAML/SASS, MySQL, Git, Sidekiq, Elastic Search, DO

This is a full-time opportunity in beautiful Seattle, WA with benefits and early equity in a fast-growing startup.

Benefits: Macbook Pro, iPhone, Flexible Work Schedule and Vacation Policy, Healthcare, Stocked Kitchen, and casual working environment in N. Seattle. Position and compensation DOE.
